column1: How much do you like the taste of coffee? (scale from 1-10)
column2: How awesome does camping this weekend sound? (scale from 1-10)
column3: How good are you at making decisions (scale from 1-10)
column4: How many office supplies are within arm’s reach from you right now? (up to 10…the computer/phone you’re using now counts!)
column5: How many different people do you have conversations with at a crowded party? (from 1-10)
